  • Postgres database items

Postgres database items¶

Manages Postgres databases.

postgres_dbs = {
    "mydatabase": {
        "owner": "me",
    },
}

Attribute reference¶

See also

The list of generic builtin item attributes

Optional attributes¶

owner¶

Name of the role which owns this database (defaults to "postgres").
